website_summaries.verdict: Designed to hold your gaming laptop in a stylish, all-purpose protective easy-to-carry protective backpack.
pros: Lightweight, stylish, designed for the “Gamer on the go.” The Molded Edge Core Gaming Laptop Backpack features all the ports and cables needed for seamless, speedy charging of all your mobile devices with a built-in quick charge universal power bank
A molded front panel offers protection for electronics
cons: Some users say the backpack is a bit too small
Once they pack up all their electronic gear, there is little room left for essential personal items

customer_reviews.title: Alienware 17.3 dont fit
customer_reviews.text: My alienware 17.3 R5 dont fit, dont buy this if you want protect 17.3 size computers... 🤦‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT Fit an actual 17" wide Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, great construction... DOES NOT fit an ASUS 17" wide laptop. There is NO extra padding where the top corner of a laptop will hit the zippers, nor is there padding at the bottom of the laptop holding sleeve. A 16 1/2 x 12 1/2 inch WIDE laptop will NOT fit in the laptop "mounted" inner pocket/sleeve. Even out of the laptop holding pocket there is barely enough room to zip the bag. After the bag is zipped, there is no padding between the zipper and the laptop, so gouges WILL happen.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: A long lost love
customer_reviews.text: For years I have been toting around massive 19" ASUS ROGs, and have never had a bookbag that could properly hold them. The day I purchased thia beautiful queen is the day my troublea went away. This bag is so spacious, i have room for my gaming headset, mouse, keyboard, mat, kindle, tablet, another laptop, work binder, pens, battery packs, cellphone chargers etc.... Long story short, BUY THIS BAG, YOU WANT IT, YOU NEED IT, MAKE LOVE WITH IT..... maybe... alittle too far?
customer_reviews.author: Kyllsyn

customer_reviews.title: ... do a lot of traveling and this bag works great for carrying a laptop and all the necessary accessories
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of traveling and this bag works great for carrying a laptop and all the necessary accessories. I love the USB on the side of the bag because it allows me to charge my phone while on the plan or walking through the airport and power pack is stored in the backpack. Mobile Edge also has an AC power product that allows you to plug your laptop in and keep it charged.
customer_reviews.author: M. Crane

customer_reviews.title: Tough, comfortable, and lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to transport my office and it does just that. I keep two laptops, a mouse, mousepad, pens, papers, usb plugin devices, portable power, two sets of headphones, etc. I can't fill this thing up. The handle has steel strips to give it a high-level of support. My only complaint is that the external usb connection doesn't work well. Not a huge deal for me, but could be for some. I've traveled all across the world with this bag and it is holding up incredibly well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 17.3” msi laptop
customer_reviews.text: Lots of concern about whether or not it will fit a gaming laptop. I have a MSI w/17.3” monitor. It fits great!
customer_reviews.author: R. Evans

customer_reviews.title: BEST GAMING BACKPACK EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Holy Cow! This is the BEST gaming backpack ever! At first, the price made me bite my lip and grip my wallet tighter, but I finally gave in...and I am thrilled that I did. It is even better in person. I felt like a kid on Christmas morning the moment I unboxed this beast. There are so many storage options and I love the two places it has to stay fully charged. I got the velcro version and ordered some patches from my favorite game to display on the backpack proudly. I am now a super fan of thos company. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Filmmaker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, plenty of space, comfortable, looks cool!
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop bad I have ever owned! I was a big gamer back in the day, but most of my travel now is work related. When I travel for business, I take my work laptop, personal laptop and iPad with me. There is plenty of room plus organization for everything. I hated being cramped in a smaller bag with messy cords. There's plenty of storage compartments to separate business from pleasure and I'm the coolest commuter in the office. It's very comfortable and it doesn't feel bulky to me. What's a few more inches of bag to have the perfect setup? I'll never go back. Love this backpack!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I had an Alienware bag made by Mobile Edge for almost 10 years before I bought this one. I use this for my work laptop but gravitate toward gaming bags since they usually have plenty of space and I tend to stuff a lot of stuff in my bags. Very nice bag and well worth the money if this one lasts as long as my last bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Check everyhing closely before reviewing
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! Meets all our needs and expectations. Received it with broken zipper or zipper was a weak part and didn't withstand the first use of it. Always check your zippers. Had a dent in the front that didn't give me the feel of " I just spent 100 bucks or more on a backpack.I"ll get a exchange going through Amazon
customer_reviews.author: YMAHalim

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and easy on your back
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is awesome. It’s so comfortable to wear even for long periods of time and it makes it feel like you aren’t carrying too much weight at all. I normally have back problems the way it distributes the weight makes it easy to carry without any pain. The hard shell is perfect to customize with stickers or artwork. I’m able to fit my wallet, chargers, drawing tablet, MacBook, and lunch in it comfortably and able to easily access it all because of the various compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Makailah

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: It's the best back pack I've owned so far. I love the specialized bag compartments. The USB port to my battery pack is super cool. My only concern so far is when I grab my bag from the shoulder harness, I felt it tear a little. Hope it doesn't become a big issue.
customer_reviews.author: C. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag that DOES fit 17" gaming laptops.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the nicest backpack I have ever owned. And I am a backpack enthusiast of sorts. I received the NEW version of this backpack, which fits my 17" gaming laptop perfectly with room to spare. This new version also has a poncho on the bottom zipped pocket, to pull over if its raining. Also, lifetime warranty, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if your a serious mobile gamer
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Solid and durable, water resistant, and an incredible number of pockets. I carry my ps4 pro and switch around with 2 controllers, and a turtle beach headset with all the cords and cables required as well as magazines and medications, first aid kit and portable phone charger
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: Does an amazing job of protecting your laptop and laptop accessories
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my boyfriend whose an avid gamer. He loved it and uses it every day and 6 months later it's still just as great and its holding up extremely well! Very satisfied and would recommend this over any of the others out there.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Drsata

customer_reviews.title: It's Built Tough, and worth your investment...
customer_reviews.text: This Bag is superb, it's actually worth way more, than the price shown in my opinion. I have no complaints, it feels like it weighs more than 4 pounds, with nothing inside...it's built tough, and it can be used for whatever you'd use a Heavy Duty Backpack for, it's a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Larod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop backpack I've found! It comes with an amazing guarantee/warrantee. It protects better than even the SwissGear backpacks!
customer_reviews.author: bastbnman

customer_reviews.title: Just an amazing bag; big
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Just an amazing bag; big, lots of space/pockets and it looks very stylish. I just wish they would start making camera bags also. I hope they are durable because I intend to use them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: PhotovideogoTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good Gaming Laptop bag at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Fits my MSI Titan Laptop and is TSA Checkpoint friendly with lots of room for storage of other stuff including tablet and gaming keyboard
customer_reviews.author: john lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Issue with Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product just a pity that the the same can not said for the quality. Received the bag January 2019 it is now October and the stitching has started coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Rohan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great backpack with plenty of room for all of my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack with plenty of room for all of my gear to work. It is made of high quality materials and the charger port on the outside is a great idea for charging my devices.
customer_reviews.author: Antivirus

customer_reviews.title: Holds my Strix laptop and a small mac. Along ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds my Strix laptop and a small mac. Along with my mtg boxes for fnm. The zipper is starting to show some waving and am afraid they'll break and no the bag is not being overfilled. The elastic side of the chest buckle snapped off. Honestly don't remember how it came off.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Navoa

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Is good looking but i like beter if out of the 3 bags the laptop travel in the mid one insted of last one for more protection
customer_reviews.author: gonzalo j castillo

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, but I think the dimensions are a ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, but I think the dimensions are a little off. I have a MSI GT75VR 17" gaming laptop and it fits width but length is too short, can not zip the bag closed. I have to put the computer in another compartment in the bag. Would be a five star if the cumputer fit in the right compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: A gift for Grandson!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for our Grandson. He really uses and likes it!!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: ... it and all of his friends said it's a great pick!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised my husband with it for Christmas he loves it and all of his friends said it's a great pick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tech bag that I've owned, but....
customer_reviews.text: It's the best tech bag I've ever owned, but one of the chest strap broke on my daughter's bag
customer_reviews.author: Cordon Q. West

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack I saw very wide, can carry a lot of things
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Osman

customer_reviews.title: I love this pack
customer_reviews.text: The built in USB charging port is excellent paired with a huge battery pack I always have power on reserve.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Big Bag
customer_reviews.text: It is a lot bigger than I thought. I just would like to have a small front pocket for all of my change and receipts.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Please send me a replacement cord? Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: I received my back pack today but The supplied power cord doesn’t work? It doesn’t pass a current through to charge a device? I have to bypass the cord and go directly to the power bank to charge my IPhone?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son in the Navy that his work requires several laptops. This was perfect for what he needed. Everything about is well constructed and as advertised. Highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Miller

customer_reviews.title: Misleading sizing
customer_reviews.text: I get very tired of misleading product descriptions. Sure, you can return product easily, but it takes days what a quick trip to retail would reveal instantly. In this case, the case says it'll fit up to an 18 inch laptop, yet two or three people say it doesn't fit a Predator 17. I realize that a 17.3" laptop is actually 21" diagonally. Manufacturers should put the actual laptop compartment size, in LxWxH, but they don't, hoping you'll buy it. This needs to stop! Hopefully more 1 star reviews will correct this behavior. Sorry for the low review, if you've got a 16" laptop it looks like it would be a nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: John G

product_meta.title: Mobile Edge Core Gaming Laptop Backpack, Molded Front Panel, 17 - 18 Inch, External USB 3.0 Quick-Charge Port and Built-in Charging Cable ScanFast TSA Checkpoint Friendly Black w/Red Trim MECGBP1
product_meta.description: Style:MoldedDesigned specifically for gamers, the new Core Gaming Backpack holds most popular models of gaming laptops and/or consoles (i.e., Xbox One, PS4, Nintendo Switch) . The backpack offers three large storage sections that are pre-wired for a power bank or external battery. Four side accessory pockets are perfect for cables, phone, a gaming mouse or oversized water bottles. There is also an external USB ChargePort built in that provides instant power access to your phone or other devices. This Full-featured backpack is constructed from durable ballistic nylon and includes padded air-mesh shoulder straps and back panel, a padded carry handle for easy lifting and a trolley strap for stacking on other luggage. The backpack also features a CheckPoint-Friendly laptop compartment, a separate fleece lined pouch for an iPad, tablet or e-reader, a headphone holder and plenty of space to hold your extra gear and personal items.
feature_bullets: Sized to hold most popular models of Gaming Laptops up to 17" and/or consoles (i.e., Xbox One, PS4, Nintendo Switch)
Checkpoint-Friendly design to speed through TSA checkpoints
Prewired universal power bank pocket for charging items in each section
External USB 3.0 Quick-Charge compatible port and built-in charging cable
Three separate sections for a laptop, tablet, keyboard, files, accessories and your personal items

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars63 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
